content.detailedDescription: 3 red orange lights were lined up on top of each other vertically then changed to triangle shape and continued rotating. we observed for about 5 mins from time of sighting to when they dissapeard. one dipped down from the group and shot off when plane was passing by and they other two lights dim out and dissapeard
content.summary: 3 red orange lights lined up vertically then changed to triangle shape and continued rotating. we observed for about 5 mins from time of sighting to when they dissapeard. one dipped down from the group and shot off when plane
Aprox 40-50 orb like lights form shape oftri

content.detailedDescription: I spent the evening cleaning my garage. after i finished for the evening i went to the driveway to smoke a cigarette - approx 9:45 - and was looking up at the night sky and saw a bright orange orb over to the north coming across the tree line. i instantly yelled to my wife to come look at object. after she seen the object we got really nervous and starting scrambling looking for cameras and video camera. video camera was dead. i then went back to the driveway to see it go across the sky. my wife then went to the back porch to see it come across the houses and headed to the west. i then moved to the back porch to observe. we both just stared at object in amazement of what we were witnessing. the object made no sound what so ever and no sudden moves in any direction. it started in the north and headed to the west. my wife and i watched the orange orb object going further in the western distance. after about 10 minutes the object then disappeared in a flash. after the object disappeared we both looked at eachother in amazement of what we both witnessed. throughout the evening we kept returning the porch looking for the object but to no avail. roughly 20 minutes later a helicopter was heard in the the distance hovering over the similiar area. the helicopter was easily recognizable with its swishing noise and flashing lights. the object it we saw was blaze orange and made no sound. we have never seen anything like it. it was not a plane or helicopter or anything like that.
content.summary: Standing in driveway and looked up and seen orange orb strreak across sky from north to west then disappeared instantly after ten minutes

content.detailedDescription: While driving along 6 mile rd in northville, i witnessed a star-like light in the south sky over plymouth, mi.  i noticed it at 6 mile and sheldon and could still see it at 6 mile and ridge rd to the southeast.  at first i thought it was a bright star, then i noticed it was dipping down in the sky.  it changed in color from blue to violet to green to red.  it moved about the sky like a fruit fly in a random pattern though staying in a small area of the sky, dipping below the horizon then coming back up.  the brightness varied, changing from very bright to invisible.  i pulled over to watch the light, and after rolling down my window, i did not notice any sound though it seemed quite far away.  the light disappeared below the horizon.  about an hour later, i noticed the light was back and behaving the same as before.  i watched it slowly dip below the horizon again and didn't notice it any further.  the clouds rolled in.
content.summary: While driving, saw colored light, changed color, randomly moving about the south sky

content.detailedDescription: At about midnight, my friends and i started a campfire in my back yard. shortly after we started the fire i noticed an anomalous object on the western horizon. i would say that the object was definitely elongated, or shaped like a cigar. if you were sitting down and you held an aspirin capsule at arms length it would be a good size reference for this object. it was a lime green color and it was glowing with a high luminosity. it made no sound and it did not move.  it 'hovered' in the same spot for nearly 3 and a half hours , and everyone saw it. the only reason that we 'lost sight of it' was because it started raining and we had to go inside. the object was miles and miles away but i believe that it must have been massive considering the elongated shape was clearly visible and because of how bright it was glowing. i live next to the city so i can hardly ever see stars or other celestial objects anyway and this was a cloudy night. there were no other stars out tonight. i thought it could have been a comet but the object just was just to solid. there was no tail or streak and it was way to low on the horizon. all i could do was stare at it. i couldn't say anything to the people around me for a moment. someone finally asked me what i was looking at and i was able to use reference points to show them what i was seeing. they saw it and nobody else could really come up with an explanation either. im left baffled by this and i really don't know what to think right now. i know what i saw, and i know what i didn't see.  what are we supposed to do about this?
content.summary: Cigar shaped object . enormous size considering the approximated distance of the object.

content.detailedDescription: Albertsons on state and 17th boise,id
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: This object looked almost like a star but it was obviously flashing red, white and sometimes green lights. it hovered over my house moving back and forth but only about an inch each way(from my view). it was higher up though so it could have been 10 feet. this is not the first night i have seen this object and would like to know what it is.
content.summary: Flashing "star" hovered over my house

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my dogs and i texted my friend.  he answered "i'm watching that ufo i told you about". before he told me where to look i scanned the sky in the direction of his house and spotted a star that seemed to be flickering red and blue.  from where i was visible through the branches of a tree.  i tried to photograph it with my phone with no success. then i got my camera ( 30x zoom 10 megapixel). but i had no tripod for it so the pictures were unclear and streaky.   i went upstairs in my house and turned off all the lights in an attempt to view it through the open window.  at this point it was much higher in the sky. and appeared to be dancing from left to right and spinning.  i went out to the shed and got my daughters telescope.  when i brought it inside it fogged up and i had to wait 20 mins or so for it to climatize.   when i finally was able to see it through the viewfinder i couldn't believe my eyes.  i showed my son and text my wife at work.   she went outside to see it as well  to the naked eye it was weird ..... but through the telescope it was obviously not a plane or a star it looked like a rip in time. spinning and flashing and pulsating  sort of spherical  swaying from left to right but continuing to slowly move higher we observed it through the telescope for around an hour.  and i just couldn't look anymore.  it doesn't make sense.  nothing i have ever seen before   its still there now.  almost straight up now  just can't keep watching it
content.summary: Pulsating orb of blue and red and white light visible through telescope. appeared to spin and waiver left to right as it progressed higher in the horizon

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was driving home on hand rd. in sarasota, fla. around 9pm and my husband told me to look up and we saw 4 red objects in the sky just hovering.  there was no other lights blinking like an airplane would have, then 1 of the red objects flew away going north and the other objects stayed then puff gone. i have never saw anything like it before ever. when i first saw the object i knew it was not an airplane or anything i have ever seen before.
content.summary: 4 objects hovering in red color, not flashing in any other color

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 27, 2010, i was sleeping on a fouton on the floor of the bedroom in my apartment when i suddenly awoke and opened my eyes. lying on my right side, i could view the wall which was about two feet in front of me just beyond the open bedroom door. another foot down the wall was the only window in the room. behind me, a wall mirror was propped against the wall just to the left of the fouton. blinking lights from a source outside were reflected perfectly from outside the window at just the right angle to reflect onto the mirror propped against the wall behind me, and then reflected across the fouton to the wall in front of me as i lay on my right side. i glanced up at the window and saw an aircraft hovering motionless in the sky perfectly positioned for me to see it clearly from my position on the floor. it had many blinking lights of red, blue, white, and possibly yellow, similar to those of a police or emergency vehicle during a stop. from my position on the bed on the floor looking upward, the craft appeared to be in the shape of a boomerang. there were round balls of colored lights equidistant across both wings which appeared to blink randomly. there was no sound that i could hear. the window was closed. i had never seen a craft like this before, but thought it might be an alien craft. just then, i felt the presence of three or four beings in my bedroom. i continued to lay on the fouton with my head on the pillow. i could feel their energy but not see them. clearly, i could distinguish the sense of three beings and possibly a fourth one.  then, as if in my mind���s eye, i saw the image of a grey et and telepathically heard, ���we don���t want to scare you���.  before i could process this statement to respond, the grey lifted his spindly arm and with an arc of his arm and like the flick of a switch, i was out cold, asleep. i had not looked at the clock (which was on the night stand behind me) when i first awoke and saw the lights. nor did i look at the clock when i again opened my eyes to find myself still lying in bed. so, i don���t know the exact time of the visitation or how long it lasted. i felt as if i needed to urinate. so, i got up. as i stood up in the dark room, i could not see them with my eyes but could feel the energy of at least three beings and possibly a fourth. their energy felt a bit more diffused than when i was lying down. i could feel them watching me, observing. i walked across the hall to the bathroom, urinated, and returned to my bed. i sensed that they had me arise to use the bathroom just to observe me to see if i could go about this common routine. i felt as if they were scientists watching, whispering comments about my ability to carry out this routine task. i mumbled to myself as i returned to bed, annoyed that i didn���t know what was going on. yet i was compliant in completing the routine. as i put my head on the pillow, lying on my right side as i was before, i felt very sleepy, unable to keep my eyes open. i struggled to keep my eyes open but they would close on me and i would force them open and they would close again, as if i was drugged. finally, i succumbed to the extreme drowsiness, allowing my eyes to close and i went back to sleep. i don���t know how much time lapsed. for a brief moment, i reopened my eyes and gazed at the window where i saw a small grey et peering in the closed window at me. he was standing on the balcony just outside of the bedroom window. i would estimate him to be about three feet tall. his large head was typical of the greys seen in pictures. his large expressionless solid black eyes stared at me. his nose looked like a couple of small holes with an almost nonexistent mouth. he cocked his head to the left side in an inquisitive sort of way. his movements and the expression on his face appeared rather mechanical, as if devoid of emotion or any sort of deep thought. his affect and head movement was more robotic than organic. i wanted to keep looking and see what would happen next, but an overwhelming sense of sleepiness overcame me and i closed my eyes. my curiosity compelled me to force my eyes open one more time. the grey was gone from the balcony and i felt no energetic presence of any other beings in my apartment. i immediately saw a white orb of light dart from the apartment building up towards the boomerang-shaped craft that remained hovering in the sky. the light joined the end of the wing closest to me, appearing consistent as the other lights along the wings. instantly, the ship darted upwards to the left (from my perspective), disappearing from my view through the window. still struggling with a feeling of overwhelming fatigue, and despite my attempts to keep my eyes open, my eyes closed and i immediately returned to sleep. i slept through the night until the alarm clock woke me in the morning to get ready for work. i stood up from the fouton and looked around the bedroom. everything appeared normal. i slowly walked into the bathroom, glanced down the hallway and into the livingroom. nothing appeared any different from when i went to bed the night before. i had no obvious changes to my body and otherwise felt like normal. i have no sense of time about the incident, that is, what time it occurred in the night or how long it lasted. so, it may have occurred before midnight on october 27, 2010 or in the early morning of october 28, 2010. as i got ready for work, i kept wondering where the craft and greys came from, why they visited me in particular, and what they did when i was asleep. i continue to wonder and would love to find the answers.
content.summary: Awakened from sleep at night and saw a boomerang-shaped craft with blinking lights hovering in the sky outside of bedroom window. visitation by 3-4 entities.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of december 31st 2011 around 11pm-11:45pm me and a security guard were having a conversation at the lobby desk of the apartments i live at in los angeles. the security guard wanted to take a quick smoke break so i accompanied him just out front of the lobby on the sidwalk. as we were smoking 2 bright lights in the sky appeared out of nowhere. apparently me and the security guard were looking in the same part of the sky because as soon as the orb like lights appeared me and the guard turned our heads towards one another in disbelief and immediately turned our gazes back to the two bright objects. when they appeared it seemed as though they may have been traveling at a good amount of speed and came to an abrupt, slight stop, then began to travel as a fighter jet and his wingman do, in the direction of santa monica. whatever the two bright objects were (bright like fire) didnt hang around but maybe 40 seconds tops. the two objects accelerated at an amazingly high rate of speed and appeared to have just vanashed.  i was able to snap a picture from my cellphone before they went to wherever they were going.

       about 13 to 15 hours later on january 1st 2012 i was at a bus stop in hollywood.  was a beautiful sunny day. as i was waiting for the bus i noticed a floating eyesore advertisement (blimp). as i was watching the blimp maneuver, i caught a glimpse of two objects that were reflecting sunlight (i believe) and appeared to be silver. these two bright silvery craft appeared to be at a considerably high altitude and traveling close together and in the same direction as the two objects from the night before. when i noticed them they were traveling extremely fast but was also in for a shock. the lead craft looked as though it was gaining speed and the one on the left was lagging behind. but that was not the case. the craft to the left slowed all the way down to what i can only describe as a complete stop. once stopped it did not lose altitude.  the craft to the left looked as though it slowed down to the point of a stop and hover but when it came to the stop/hover, it accelerated towards the stopped craft faster than iv seen any object, thing, vehicle move in all my life or imagination.  once the lead craft reached the stopped craft, the lead one appeared to come alarmingly close to the stopped one, circled all around it, than accelerated back in the direction they were traveling. once the lead craft got to about the distance that it had first switched directions, craft number 2 (laggy) accelerated at a very high rate of speed. all this happened within something like 30 seconds give or take. i was in such a state of disbelief that i had forgot my cellphone was in my hand. when i realized this i immediately pointed it at the event. i blindly hit the camera button nit knowing i had actually hit the camcorder button until i started seeing my phone was catching this event on video!  the point at which i did record this was when the lagging craft was catching up with the lead craft. i dont think my cellphone picked up the lead craft as i was a little too slow and they were extremely high above. thats all i have.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright objects traveling together then accelerated at unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription:
This event actually happen in august 13th 1994 however i am more interested in the past several months

in september of 2012 i went back to vegas to visit my abductors. i was at least telepathically raped and emotionally destroyed by what i saw.

i went back to face them and or where i was possibly taken.

i went back to where i saw it land and an apache indian was waiting for me unannounced to escort me on private property to take me to a hole i've been watching for ten years.

that is when all my troubles began that is where i found a very unusual rock and that is where my camera was eventually destroyed.  the hole can't be filmed at least by me i have tried several times.  you can find my rock at we were waiting for each other 100 on you tube

the first time i knew i filmed it yet when i reviewed it showed i never got that far.  i believe i was given a very special rock which i will not part with but will bring it to who ever wants to investigate this.

since my first episode with my hole they removed my tracking device in my hand and cured my arthritis in my hip.

since then i have been in telepathic communication with them.  they refuse to show themselves to me because i indicate that i'm to afraid and not sure i can handle it.  they have responded to many requests they have told me that they live in the pavo's solar system.  i confirmed this under hypnosis with my therapist.

i asked them to create a storm over appleton wisconsin on december 20th and i would be waiting for them at the linden l at 2pm and midnight on that date.  the day before the winter advisory warning was 2pm through midnight appleton wisconsin got hit with one storm all winter on that date with a foot of snow.  my dispatch computer where i get my orders called me at exactly 12 midnight to the second.  this is not possible and now have a record of that.   i posted this event on youtube several weeks before and planning it much longer.  no one knew how to contact me,  it was not a coincidence it had to be them.

they answered everyone of suggestions i have a rock i can't explain and they told me where they lived.  i have many more requests that they fulfilled for me.  i also have pictures of a mining company where they landed that also can't be explained.

i know this isn't exactly what you want.  i am willing to show my evidence talk to you on the phone as long as it takes to convince you i'm not crazy or come see you.  i am not interested in you funding this situation but i need protection when i go back to vegas to finally know the truth.  i am willing to surrender my camera that has all my video on it and you can take it apart to see why it was damaged.

i admit that there is a possible chance that this is my imagination or i am creating these events to take place however i have them all very well documented and in advance.

i have to go back on my own to find out.  i am terrified to do it since each time i've gone they have altered my thoughts.  i have to do it with or with out your help even if it means my death or disappearance.  i want to do it alone and have to do it alone i just what someone to know what i'm doing and to track me when i go.

i know it's not exactly what you are looking for but it's very real and worth your time to explore with me.  thank you please contact me and you will understand that this is real.  

i know this is real and that they do exist please watch how much i believe on you tube at or with the title how i communicate to my alien friends,

thank you to find the truth you have to put out the effort like i am doing,
content.summary: Strange lights over the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Last night my wife and i went to our font yard to have, our nightly,  cigarette break together. we were talking for about 3 minutes or so, when all of a sudden a bright blue orb with a redish trail, very low altitude flew east to west. it also continuously reflected a very bright whitish light - like the flash of a camera.  it happened for about 6 seconds or so, but i do not think it was a meteor- these lights were unbelievably radiant and long lasting. i've seen meteors before - this in my opinion - was not one.  

my wife panicked and went upstairs to make sure the kids were ok. i stayed outside and 3 woman who happened to be walking by - i stopped and asked them if they had just seen that blue light in the sky. they had - and were in shock just as we were. we looked up to see if it would reappear but it was gone. it definetly wasn't any kind of plane - as i'm currently a student pilot and know about planes. and i don't think it was a meteor - cause aside from the way it looked -  cause nothing could go that fast, that low, without making noise. 

i'm still shocked today, and neither my wife or i got a good night's rest cause of it. of course i didn't get any pictures, as this was the last thing i expected to see last light and also it happened so fast.
content.summary: Very low flying bright blue orb heading east to west. no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Before i was going to bed last night, i caught this out our skylight. i thought it was the moon but it was fluttering. after a closer look and seeing the moon was in the opposite sky as where this was, and planes flying what looked to be way under it, i decided to snap a few pics. the first quickly took the pics from inside the house out the skylight which has a screen. i then went outside and took a clearer one. for sure it was not the moon, nor a plane or helicopter as it was hovering around same area fluttering all over the place.
a bright white/greenish bright object that i probably would have just thought it was a planet that you could see this time of year or something, until i noticed it was moving around enough, to where i was standing dead still, with all the house lights off and it was moving in and out of the square of the skylight very erratically. this was well beyond where their would be any flight traffic.At least a few miles higher.
i watched it for about a half hour, including taking the pics. being so late and having to work in the morning, i had to call it a night so i can not say how long it was actually there besides what i saw. this is in staten island, ny, in the skies , back over the water from gateway to prince's bay. this is approximate logistics, as i am not an astronomer to tell you where in the skies it actually was.
cn
content.summary: A bright white/greenish bright object

content.detailedDescription: on the date of observation, i was in an open field on what was then privately owned property of the gyrodyne corporation on the north shore of long island ny near the towns of flowerfield and stony brook. the land is now owned by the state university of new york at stony brook. i was in the field that day practicing wilderness survival skills i had been developing after attending a survival school in new jersey a few years prior. there were no clouds in the immediate vicinity as i have a habit of scanning the sky in order to identify any high flying birds that may be in the area i.E. red tailed hawks. i looked up and the movement of what first appeared to be a small cloud at an extreme height caught my attention in the southeast at approximately 70 degrees above the horizon from a reference point of 90 degrees which would have been directly above me. however, this movement was unlike any cloud movement i had witnessed during my previous, at the time, 30 years on the planet. what began as a tiny object grew rapidly during the course of its 3 to 4 second descent to a much larger object hovering at about the height of where helicopters might hover but much, much lower the airspace of jet aircraft. to estimate the size of this object, a common coffee table coaster held at arms length would have barely covered it at this distance. the object appeared silvery white, not exactly translucent but not exactly solid either. the edges of the object were ill defined and had the definite appearance of waviness, similar to a water mirage on a road on a hot day. i had the distinct feeling at the time that this object was either a spiritual manifestation of some sort or a terrestrial or extra terrestrial air vehicle exhibiting a high-tech form of camouflage. i observed this object hovering for over 5 minutes . i was seized my a feeling that this object was acutely interested in me and my activities. i started to consider that if this was of extra terrestrial origin or spiritual origin i was perhaps in some danger and my emotions ranged from a benign anxiety to alarm. whether my feelings were perceived by the object or entities therein is unknown but the object accelerated from a standstill toward the east at what i can only describe as incredible speed . the object then appeared to execute a 90 degree turn to the south without slowing down but this angle was impossible to determine with accuracy from my vantage point. the object, due to this incredible speed, then disappeared from sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A round to oval semi-solid appearing object with ill defined borders made a rapid descent from an undetermined height to hover approximately 1/2 - 1 mile above the ground then accelerated at tremendous speed to the east abruptly changing.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving at 7 pm when she saw the object first. we live right near the nc/sc state line. we were leaving calabash, nc heading to myrtle beach, sc when she first spotted it. she said there is a bright light moving in the sky. i could not find it myself, as i was also trying to drive. all of the sudden, she said it disappeared. we drove just a few miles up into sc and then i saw it. right in front of us!! it was not a plane for sure. just a big, bright light in the sky moving very slowly. my daughter agreed that it was the same thing she had just seen earlier. we were looking to see if there was anything in front of or behind this light to show us that it was just a plane. there was nothing at all. just a bright light that would dim and get brighter again and moving all by itself??? we watched it for app. 30 seconds as it traveled across the hwy. as we were both watching it, it vanished in an instant. there were clouds way off in the distance, but there weren't any near us or this object. nothing for this thing to hide behind or obstruct our view. we began to look around and saw a plane flying nearby. we could see that it was an actual plane!!! pretty obvious!!! no lights, as it was day light still. we drove onto the interstate about 5 miles up and my daughter saw it again. i couldn't find it once again this third time. she watched it for about 20 sec and then she laughed and said, "it's gone again!!" almost as if it knew we were watching it. it would just vanish. i even pulled over right when i watched it disappear the second time. i was parked right in front of where it was, and we saw nothing. if it had been a plane, we would have seen it again at some point and it couldn't just disappear. there is no way something could have just evaporated like that. this was so obvious and real, i hate no one else was with us to see it. again, this was not a plane. we both agreed it was pretty freaky!
content.summary: Saw this bright glowing star three times in different places in broad daylight with no cloud cover nearby. totally just disappeared each time.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my boyfriend smoking a cigarette facing south. i was looking at the stars and noticed 3 of them that formed a triangle when suddenly i observed one of the "stars" was actually moving. i pointed it out to my boyfriend who also then saw it. we thought it had to be a satallite because it was literally as high as the stars. the point of light at first was just as dim looking as the stars as well. we watched as it traveled, almost gliding, in a southward direction. it then dimmed to almost near impossible to see when all of a sudden it grew brighter and brighter... i mean bright, like it were a spot light. the object itself intensified in brightness. i was almost expecting to see a blinding flash of light or explosion or something, but then just as it gradually grew in brightness it dimmed back down. that is when we could no longer see it. we both were speculating what on earth that could've been. def not a plane. as planes cant possibly travel at such altitudes. def not a satallite... how could a satallite brighten with such intense light. def not a comet due to lack of tail, and def not a meteor because it would have traveled at a much faster speed. we were both pretty excited to come to the conclusion that we most likely just witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Straight path, thought it was a satallite due to its high elevation. traveled south, dimmed then very bright light, then dimmed again

content.detailedDescription: I was going over my video dvr box when i came accross this black object looks like an back egg with something hanging at the bottom you realy have to slow it down to see it but it looks to me to go into another dimention also after that what looks like to me a ball of light come flying above ihave no idea what these objects are but you can see the plane flying at the top
content.summary: There were two in the same video i cant describe it

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At work in a tower crane taking pictures of clouds though the day when had time to and my boyfriend looked over the pictures and pointed this picture out at the time there was no noise like aircraft and it was a nice day and this was over kettering town im only sending this to you know as we where watching a tv program
content.summary: Flying around the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the ne section of hickory,nc.
it was march 21st at 8:40pm i had walked outside at 8:22 pm looking for the pan starrs comet i was having no luck and was about to walk inside when i just happened to look up toward orion when something caught my eye.
it was moving very fast, but i had enough time to look at it through my 10x40 binoculars for several seconds.
it was twisting and rolling just like a ribbon or a snake but moving width wise east to west as if a strong wind was pushing it. the breeze was maybe 5 mph but blowing west to east, there was absolutely no sound.
the object was self illuminated almost pulsating a dull gold/copper color
but only on the bottom.
like a light was shining on it from the ground but that wasn't the case.
i started to run inside and call the local airport, but we are about to lose our airport's tower and i didn't want to bother them with a ufo report.
the object passed over my yard and 2 of my neighbors yard toward a shopping center before it vanished from view.

i do know geese fly at night but they don't glow or shimmer and they normally honk when they fly so they don't bump into each other, plus this wasn't a v shape.
i live in a fly zone for the airport so i'm used to seeing aircraft at night, i'm guessing this was at least 1000 feet up and about 120 ft long like the 3 buses end to end give or take, but not very thick.

ive seen several things i couldn't explain in the years past, but nothing like this and the effect it has had over me, i have been so on edge all day i just felt like i had to report it.
i hope another backyard stargazer was as lucky as i and got to see it also.
it was pretty amazing, i just wish i had taken my camera outside, but i hadn't.
content.summary: Object looked like a ribbon twisting , rolling and moving width wise moving east to west covered my yard and out of sight in 5-7 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I started to be woke up at 3:33am about 2008.First sighting lights flashed sequentially.White lights.2nd sighting pale orange lights looked liked stars blinked on then off one at a time,about ten lights.They have communicated with me, they know my thoughts.Numbers i see in my mind.333,11 22 888.Have seen black helicopter up close, not a helicopter something very advanced.Have seen triangles but i think their military.I think they are advanced humans.The one that communicated with me is a female.She said she is god.
content.summary: Lights flashed sequentially....Lights were white...3:33am wake up call

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking towards the east, where just above the tree line i was watching 3 hawks flying around in circles.  i looked maybe a foot to the left and something spherical or orb looking object caught my eye.  it was just different i cannot explain.  i focused on it as closely as i could, but it was silent and moving very quickly.  when the object was to my north it faded into a tree line and i could not scope it back out.. at this time i looked back east and saw a commercial airline heading in similar direction so i compared the height and speed.  the object had to be at least a 1-2 miles high, and moving in the area of 400-600mph, possible a little more.  it had no characteristics of the airplane.  it was just a orb/spherical object moving  se to nw, silent, and fast. it was a dull grey/white metallic color. not shiny, but it slightly reflected the sun, in a very dull way.  i am trying not to jump to any conclusion, but i am an avid sky watcher and it just seemed to be quite different from anything i've seen in the sky. it was not another airplane very high in the sky.  i have lived here my whole life and watched airplanes coming into the chicago area, and this was not a plane!
content.summary: Spherical object seen traveling 400-600mph w/ airplanes and birds in background for comparison

content.detailedDescription: Before i saw the object i was about to fall asleep. i noticed it when the house started vibrating. when i saw it at first i thought it was a plane but it did not make any noise. it looked like i triangle with several lights surrounding the extirior. when i saw it i was shocked and didn't know what to do. i lost sight of it when it flew over to the other side of my house.
content.summary: I saw it fly right over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from my ex's along a dark country road with green neons on under my car i look up just in front of me and just above the tree top is this triangle shape craft just skimming the trees it was huge each tip had a light on it that changed color between white, orange red yellow blue. it slowed and followed me for about 700 yards above the trees (while moving the triangle was spinning slowly. i tried to call my ex but had dead signal (this could of been poor coverage as i was in the middle of nowhere and the road is dodgey for signal but u usually get some signal at least) as soon as the craft had moved from above me and got to a fair distance my signal came back and i was able to call my now ex to tell her and her family what had happened. it then moved off to my left and got to a distance of 2 farming fields away and followed me until i was about to enter the village of hales at which point  it shot of in a up and diagonal direction at speeds i know not possible by any known craft.

the craft was low when it was above me you could see a distinct outline and the lights but the craft seemed either dull or partially see through say 20% - 25% transparent
content.summary: Less than 20-25ft above me then followe my car at distance for 4-5 mins

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I though it was a star in the sunrise, but it was bright and below the cloud bank at one point.  i took a camera out because it was bright but it disappeared as soon as i looked into the viewfinder.  i see stars alot because of clear skies here, so i know what a start could look while the sun is coming up.  and i was on the beach next to america's pmrf missle range, where there has been experimental testing the past few months
content.summary: I though it was a star in the sunrise, but it was bright and below the cloud bank at one point.  and i was on the beach next to america's pmrf missle range, where there has been experimental testing the past few months

content.detailedDescription:
Walking to my car to go to quick trip in liberty off 291 highway, as i walked out of my apartment into the parking lot there was a woman on the phone yelling at me "do you see that? do you see that?" 
i pulled out my phone and took various pictures as well as a short video. several other witnesses came from the apartment to witness it. after about 10 minutes they were gone and i got in my car and went quiktrip. as i walked into quiktrip an officer was being dispatched over his radio to investigate the lights over office 291 highway. the officer seemed as though he did not believe, but went to investigate before i left. 

when i was sitting there watching them they would circle and hover and then from the right side it appeared as if they were flying up from the ground and meeting the others blinking their lights off and on and forming some sort of triangular pattern.. and then they would fly straight up and disappear, until finally only one was left. that was what i captured on my video. 

i will post the link to the video once i can get it uploaded on you tube from my phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking to car, saw lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were sitting on the couch watching tv. i happened to look out the window and saw a bright light. i assumed it was an airplane heading for purdue's airport. about 5 minutes later i looked and it was in the same spot. i thought it was odd and watched it thru the window for a minute. i then told my son to take a look at it. he got up from the couch, went to the window and looked. he saw it also. we went out onto the front porch to try to get a better look. to the naked eye it looked like a large ball of light, flashing and changing colors, but difficult to see much other than that. my son went and got our binoculars and we looked at it thru them. it looks like a triangle with variously color changing lights on the outside that pulse. it's been 40 minutes so far and it has gotten brighter than when we first saw it.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo with pulsing lights on the outside

content.detailedDescription:
Four of us were at our hunting camp in washington county ga. it is dark in our camp at night. i was the first person to see the objects. i first thought it was an aircraft beacon. the light suddenly materialized an enlarged to a very bright orange-red sphere. then it suddenly turned off. it it then re-appeared in another part of the sky and stayed bright for approx. 30 seconds and moved at what appeared to be high rates of speed and making sudden 90 degree turns. i was trying to figure out what it was when suddenly 5 of the same objects appeared in a perfect delta formation. the formation was slowly moving south to north. it was very dark that night and i couldn't make out a solid shape associated with the lights. the lights suddenly went dark and i ran to another building and got one of my hunting buddies to see the event. he saw several of the lights and appeared to move at very high rates of speed. the numbers of lights varied from one to two and they moved around each other as they sped across the sky. there was no sound during this incident. i read that a sighting took place in dublin,ga. shortly after this incident. our club is located approximately 20 miles northeast of dublin. we have hunting in this location for almost 30 years and i have spent a lot of time there. i have seen numerous aircraft in the in night sky but have never seen anything like this. we got two other club members to observe the lights during this incident. they only saw about 5 minutes of the event. the event lasted approximately 15 minutes. please let me know if you need any additional information.

thank you.
content.summary: I observed up to 5 lights that would appear glow bright and fade fast.

content.detailedDescription: Went to bed observed out window single bright light decend from up in sky straight down to earth . did not see landing. took about one second.Thought maybe a shooting star . but no trail and seem to start from fixed position in sky.
content.summary: Light decend straighy down from sky to earth

content.detailedDescription: I was going to a convenience store. on my way i saw a bright white light that looked like it was on top of a distant radio tower. i thought it was odd because i've never noticed it before. on my way back home i passed that area again and when i looked it was now to the left of the tower but just as bright. i knew a plane wouldn't have still been there in that same area during my trip to the store so i went home and grabbed my camera. i parked in a field with a clear view and began recording. the hovering light stayed near the tower but was moving slowly in different directions and sometimes it would vanish. then another appeared. together they floated upwards at an angle to each other. then again vanished. i observed this pattern and then one began coming my way. i filmed it as it flew overhead with a strange light or something that looked like it was emitting or being sucked into the front of it. as you would imagine a smoke cloud coming out of a jet but this was being sucked in the front as it traveled. i could see a weird halo that was not captured on the video for whatever reason but i could see it with my naked eye. after it traveled over my head and headed off i could then see what i hadn't noticed before, behind me. in the sky many of these things were around all in a formation and almost undetected to the naked eye. my camera picked them up perfectly. they were periodically flashing lights, from red, white and green. white was seen the most. when i got home and looked at my video i noticed how many there were. at least ten but i'm not sure if some were the same and just moving that quick to another part in the sky. i have the video and i contacted the local faa to which i was told there was nothing unusual in my area last night and that i should maybe contact the police dept. i would love to have someone from mufon look at my video. i'm a photographer so the video is very clear, even when it goes over my head. i also have photos from a separate event from the summer of 2012.
content.summary: Bright white orb hovering over ground, grabbed camera recorded 30 minutes of multiple ufo's one went over my head.
